input.sentences: the thompsons went on a vacation
they spent most of their time in the pool at their hotel .
the room they stayed in was very spacious
[male] thompson and his dad got a picture with the hotel manager -- he was so helpful .
later that night the thompsons went to a show .
output.sentences: We won a trip to Hawaii on Wheel of Fortune!
The water was so beautiful, we swam all day today.
Our room is so exotic and comfortable, I can't wait to relax later.
We were able to make a few friends while we were here.
The entertainment is so exciting, I don't want to leave!
